mapper.sql: account_Id, user_name, password, pcode, cname, bpn, state, profile_photo, role, create_time, address_code, business_category, remark, ext1, ext2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from users
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into users (account_Id, user_name, password, pcode, cname, bpn, state, profile_photo, role, create_time, address_code, business_category, remark, ext1, ext2) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bpn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{profilePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addressCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessCategory,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update users
account_Id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcode = #{record.pcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cname = #{record.cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select distinct user_name from users where role!='P' and role =#{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
